titleInfo.title: 0686. Persimmon Exhibit, Mexican Section, Hort'l Hall.

subject.topic: World's Industrial and Cotton Centennial Exposition (1884-1885 : New Orleans, La.)

mods.abstract: The camera stands at floor level looking down one axis of the horticulture building. Tables loaded with persimmons stand in the foreground.
